articles.title: The Easter Bunny is an essential worker, says Maine governor
articles.description: Gov. Janet Mills on Saturday wrote in a directive that "The Easter Bunny performs the essential services of hiding Easter Eggs and bringing untold joy to thousands of Maine children every year."
articles.content: Recognizing that friendly magical creatures, like the Easter Bunny, are essential to the health and happiness of Maine children, today I declared them performers of essential services. May this bring hope and happiness to Maine children and families during th… [+100 chars]

articles.title: Some world leaders ignore officials' warnings about Covid-19
articles.description: As governments around the world take drastic measures to curb the spread of the coronavirus, the leaders of Brazil, Belarus and Nicaragua are ignoring health officials' warnings. CNN's Matt Rivers has more.

articles.title: Ben Affleck is hosting an online celebrity poker game for charity
articles.description: Ben Affleck and a handful of his famous friends are teaming up to play a virtual game of poker Saturday to raise money for one of the biggest domestic hunger-relief organizations.

articles.author: Sheena Jones and Jay Croft, CNN
articles.title: NYC school buildings closed until end of school year, mayor says
articles.description: New York City public school buildings will be remain closed through the end of the school year because of coronavirus concerns -- though remote instruction will continue -- city officials say.
